name: Sarah M.
text: Ritika's reading was incredibly accurate and gave me the clarity I needed during a difficult time.

name: Michael R.
text: The spiritual cleansing session was transformative. I felt renewed and at peace.

name: Emma L.
text: Her intuitive abilities are remarkable. Every prediction has come true so far!

name: Priya K.
text: The Numerology course opened my eyes to patterns I never noticed. Highly recommended!

name: James W.
text: Learning palmistry from Ritika was amazing. She breaks down complex concepts beautifully.
